participant_2.background:
I'm a Disney fan who collects little raincoat-wearing toys.
i am a college drop out.
i moved far from home.
I was a country singer before I went into business.
i am in a very intimate and loving relationship.

content.text: Hey there! What's up?
Hello! Not much, how about you?
Pretty great! Just got back from a day of archery practice.
Oh wow! What's archery like? I've never tried it.
It's really fun! You use a bow and arrow to shoot targets. It's a great way to relax and focus on something.
That sounds really cool! I'm glad you enjoy it.
Thanks! I do. Do you have any hobbies?
Yeah, I like to collect little raincoat-wearing toys.
Oh wow! That's a unique hobby. Do you have a lot of them?
Yeah, I have a whole collection. I love them!
That's awesome! I'm glad you have something you enjoy doing.
Thanks! Me too! How about you, what do you do for fun?
I like to bake, watch mystery movies, and spend time with my family.
Oh wow! I love mystery movies too! What are some of your favorites?
I like the ones with twists and turns. Memento is one of my favorites.
Memento is a great movie! I love how it's told in reverse.
Yeah, that's what makes it so good! I like movies that make you think.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things you do.
Agreed! Well, it was nice talking to you. I have to go now.
Okay, it was nice talking to you too! Have a nice day!
You too!
